name: obsidian-jenni-write
description: This Obsidian plugin streamlines research and writing by allowing users to quickly search for and add academic references with a keyboard shortcut. It supports automatic APA-style citations and includes a ChatGPT-powered assistant, Jenni, for writing assistance. The plugin is free to use and enhances productivity in academic work.

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
